visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly temperature data with the series name 'Temperature'. Additionally, specify custom colors for the chart and configure other settings such as chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has custom margins for better spacing. The x-axis is labeled with months and styled with a specific color and font size. The y-axis is labeled with 'Temperature (°C)' and also has custom styling. The data series includes monthly temperature data with the name 'Temperature' and a custom color (#FF6347). The legend is enabled and styled with a dark gray color and a specific font size. Overall, the chart is designed to be visually appealing and informative.
